website_summaries.verdict: A great value for chairs that look far more expensive. Have a great retro, modern look that adds personality.
pros: Adds a different look for the dining room
cons: Faux leather punctures easily and wears out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs + great price!
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs so much! We have two young boys (1 and 3), so I was nervous about their durability, but they seem to be quite resilient! The color is amazing, and they're really sturdy and easy to put together! (Photo by Amanda Sutton Photography for our feature on West Elm's blog front + main)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful!! $200 (after tax) for 4 trendy chairs?!! Yes please!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are so cute and comfortable. Such a steal for the price. I’ve had these for about 6 months now and they’ve held up nice (I have 2 toddlers) but the leather has started to have a couple little holes on the seat cushion but you really can’t tell unless you stand really close to the chairs!
customer_reviews.author: McKinnah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super affordable / Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Really nice chairs! Great quality! I was waiting a bit to use them and post a review wanted to make sure about the quality. The base comes raw, so I painted it gold and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dario Morles

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised at how nice these chairs are especially considering the price. They are very sturdy and the fabric is so soft and easily wipes off, so far anyways. I have two kiddos aged 1 & 4 that are constantly making messes. When I had shown my mom the chairs I ordered, she laughed because I was getting something that was in style when she was a kid but now that she’s seen them and how nice they are she’s now wanting to order a set for herself. And putting them together was very easy- my 4 year old “helped” me.
customer_reviews.author: jvmeredith

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and they're very easy to assemble (my 8 year old assembled 2 of them). They are comfortable too
customer_reviews.author: Lydia K

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are fantastic! Four chairs came to a box and in total, the assembly took us about 30 minutes with most of that time spent just cutting the packing tape/foam off of the pieces. We were looking for chairs similar to this but didn't want to pay $300/chair and these are a fantastic alternative. Not only are the seats padded, but the backs are padded as well. Coming from wooden dining chairs with more of a country look to them, these are a huge upgrade as far as look and comfort go. I'm 5'5" and my husband is 6'2" and the height of the back is great for both of us. We highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love these chairs! The color goes perfect with my table base. They were really easy to assemble! The delivery was super fast! Wish they had other colors like beige/ivory/cream....I would buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Natural

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these so much!!! They are exactly the look I was going for at a very reasonable price for all FOUR! Wow!!! The legs look like wood, but they are actually metal! I was hesitant about that fact, but I gotta say, they look very realistic, don't look fake, and I think they will prove to be very durable! So I absolutely love them! The chairs are very comfortable and it was the first thing my husband said when he sat in one. Win! We are only using two chairs for now as we use bench seating to reduce space, but we will make use of the other two chairs when we have company! Absolutely love this set...great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: tenle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They were super affordable too. Took about 10 minutes to put together all 4. The legs are metal with a wood grain look. They would be easy to paint over and adjust to your style. Perfect height for a normal height dining table. I was worried about the comfort level but the shape is perfect for alleviating back pain come dinner time.
customer_reviews.author: Annie fanny

customer_reviews.title: Love these modern dining chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs mostly for the modern style but I was surprised with how comfortable they are. These chairs are great. Shipping was quick as usual and assembly was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Huss

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect!! Easy to put together and super comfy! I have received tons of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Meganhearts

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the price. Purchased the brown ones- they look so much more expensive than they are. Incredible value, nice style, easy to assemble. One tip- be careful not to puncture the material. I tried to assemble mine one seat base while it was resting atop the other and punctured a small hole in the base of the second because it was pressing too hard into it. Very comfortable to sit in too. The legs look like wood but are actually metal made to look like wood. Wish I had enough space for more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs ! Really cute and cushy / comfy . Similar ones from another store we’re about 90$ a piece so this was a great deal for all 4 . I got the faux leather and I’m really happy . The legs look like wood Vs metal too which is a nice touch even though they’re metal
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful! Looks great with my marble table and so sturdy! I love the simplicity of them and the comfort. Would def recommend buying them. Such a great price for such beautiful chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Enessa

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe it when I found these chairs at this price point. While there are are a coupe of small design flaws (i.e. the legs of one of the chairs leave a gap between the top of the leg and the bottom of the seat) I'm able to look past it because of the low price. They also arrived in great condition and have felt surprisingly sturdy. I purchased the brown option and the color is perfect to complete my mid-century modern dining room. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love my new chairs! They arrived and I was nervous I wouldn’t like them but they look really cute and are an incredible price for 4 dining chairs. I ended up spray painting the legs satin black (before assembling) using 2 coats of rust oleum universal spray paint in satin black (2 cans). They turned out just like the ones I wanted from a higher end designer but for a fraction of the price which is always great:)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to put together and perfect height for long legs.
customer_reviews.author: Kala M.

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good quality! Received a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Benett

customer_reviews.title: Some defects, overall very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At first I saw them in the lightening deal but we were late to decide. We got them anyway. We like the look a lot. When we opened the box, the legs are actually metal. They are very comfortable chairs. However, one set of the legs are not even. After we put the chair together, it is a little bit better. We will add something on the legs to make sure they are even. One of the chairs has a hole below. But we don't have time to exchange them because we have guests coming over soon.
customer_reviews.author: S. L

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the chairs! They are comfortable, easy to assemble, good size, the material is good and beautiful and has good workmanship. As for the legs, they are made of metal but imitate wood, which for me was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: best chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: chairs are super comfy, and aesthetically pleasing, exactly what i was looking for!!! best chairs
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! I feel like You can’t find a better deal for the price! They looks really nice in my dining room and I payed way less than I would have anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: the smoothest fabric
customer_reviews.text: So pleasantly surprised by these chairs. The fabric and color makes me giddy—easy to clean and super soft. They go perfectly with the Devaney Table from Wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs! I was searching for a while and didn’t want to spend $$$. These are surprisingly comfortable and look great. My husband is a big guy and loves the chairs too, says they are comfortable. There is white stitching that I wish was brown (the white has a bit of a cheap look) but that is my only complaint. Really like these chairs and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Easy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are worth the price. The legs are metal and extremely sturdy. The seat is padded and comfortable and gives your back support with the rounded design. Looks great with my new dining table. The color is beautiful and goes well with my place’s vibe. The only “meh” thing was lining up the holes with the screws, Eep, but not everything’s perfect. These chairs surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chairs! The color is great and they are pretty comfortable. Perfect for mid century feel and paired with a table I purchased on amazon too!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: I found very similar chairs on Wayfair for double the price but with black legs and on back order. I loved them but couldn’t wait for the restock. I started looking on Amazon and found these. The great reviews had me sold. We ended up spray painting the legs using the satin black spray paint another customer mentioned in her review and they turned out awesome!! They fit with our decor much better with the black legs. I did however have some trouble assembling the legs to the chair. The holes weren’t lining up very well. I’m still not sure they’re fastened properly but they seem to be sturdy when sitting on them. Overall a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Chair back just snapped off.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had 8 of these chairs since October with no issue. My husband and I were sitting at the table in these chairs moments ago... and he leaned back in one of the chairs (not dramatically... just put his hands behind his head and leaned his weight into the back of the chair) and the back of the chair snapped/cracked and broke. I have no idea how to contact the seller for these chairs but that’s kind of insane as leaning back into a chair is a fairly normal activity when sitting in a chair. I’m honestly afraid to have my guests of any size sit in these chairs at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Maley

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find the perfect chairs. I wanted chairs that weren't cold, hard, and uninviting. I also needed them to be aesthetically pleasing and easy to clean. I went to my friend's tap room and saw these. They looked so classy in that space and in pristine condition in a tap room where people are getting crazy sometimes. That's when I knew these were it. I have two young kids that are experimenting with gravity and make lots of messes. They are easy to clean. So, if you're on the fence, get off of it and get these damn chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs several months ago. The price point was amazing. I was looking for 8 chairs for my large table that would not overwhelm the space or diners. The chairs are so sleek and blend with my decor wonderfully. The material is easy to take care of. The chairs are also light and sturdy so I can easily move them around to the office and family room as needed. Assembly was a snap. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MetamorphosisKDC

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are an incredibly good value and incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect these to be luxury chairs but they definitely aren't cheap chairs either. These chairs are an incredibly good value and incredibly comfortable. Strongly recommend these and would buy again if I needed more chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great look and price!
customer_reviews.text: Our family was totally satisfied with the modern look, comfort and price of the chairs. They were very easy to assemble--it took my daughter and I less than an hour to assemble all eight--and because of the neutral color, they fit nicely into our decor.
customer_reviews.author: Pam R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Update: These are perfect! Very comfortable and fit beautifully in a small college apartment. We would definitely purchase again. The faux leather is soft and supple; no bubbling as per some other reviews. We paired it with the Zinus table, solid wood, also from Amazon. Previous: We will not have the opportunity to use until close to beginning of Oct 2020, yet have assembled to ensure product parts were all there. They assembled very easily and quickly; they are stunning. We hope that they will hold up once start using.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t put all screws in one of the chairs 😔
customer_reviews.text: I love this chairs! They are very easy to assemble except for one of them. I was unable to put all 4 screws because the hole was off. I left it with three and seems sturdy enough. The other issue is that one of the chairs has a fold and doesn’t come off. I just moved, the chairs took forever to arrive and at this point I was not going to return them. Otherwise I would have. But the quality is great and they are comfortable. We have to refinish our table and stain it. I plan to paint the legs of the chairs then.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Pales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chairs and a Trustworthy Seller
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. If I could give 10 stars I would. The chairs were easy to put together and are super comfortable. I had a problem with one set of legs being cracked. I couldn’t afford to return them because I needed them for an event. I emailed the company and unfortunately I did not see their reply. They sent me replacements and asked if they could be of further assistance. I would highly recommend these chairs and will keep this amazon seller in mind for future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: love that these are wipeable. purchased these for our dinette set. they look so much more expensive. they are comfortable as well. my only complaint is that they are about an inch or two higher than our other dining chairs so my feet barely touch the ground. I am 5'3 so I get that its probably just because I am not tall. still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marin

customer_reviews.title: Will gouge your floors.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic end caps on the chairs wore off within a month exposing the steel bottoms. Left deep gouges in our hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Castle Hill Mom

customer_reviews.title: pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are very easy to assemble the legs are metal and the seat itself is very comfortable. They do bend on the back rest if you lean to far back or are stretching.
customer_reviews.author: dcoronado21

customer_reviews.title: Check weight limit, not good for daily use
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are good quality for the price. But, I am concerned about the wooden legs holding up. I don’t see these chairs lasting after 3 years with normal daily household use. This would be a good purchase if you don’t use them daily. The legs aren’t that sturdy and a little wobbly. Check the weight limit before use, I’m 130 lbs and it felt like I beared the legs down some when sitting.
customer_reviews.author: cierra dominique bazemore

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Trendy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We've had them for a couple months now and we love them! They are easily the best price out there, and great quality! The only downside is that they are horribly difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan and Mikyla Miller

customer_reviews.title: damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: love the chairs but they came poorly packed. it looks like the leather was pierced by the feet during transit. great look, but obviously the quality is not meant for any heavy use, keep in mind if you have pets, when moving the chairs, or if you have anything sharp in your pocket when sitting. Would buy again but be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for price!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son as he had no dining chairs for his table. They match perfectly and do the job! Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miraclebaby

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, but not exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I really like the chairs. They were easy to put together, and they're very comfortable to sit in. However, the picture looks slightly different than the actual chairs. I was expecting a darker leather, and these are a lighter cloth with white stitching around the sides. They still look good in my apartment, but I wish that I could have seen what they would actually look like.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Bingham

customer_reviews.title: I'm an event planner and needed a good option of chairs that easily blend with multiple styles ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an event planner and needed a good option of chairs that easily blend with multiple styles and themes. These chairs literally feel like I discovered some secret I wasn't supposed to discover because they are SO inexpensive yet they are sturdy, stylish and extremely comfortable. If you're on the fence, I promise you won't regret it. I plan on ordering more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great set of chairs for the price. It was hard to find chairs that didn’t cost an arm and leg. Was happy I found these for a steal. They were very easy to assemble and they are comfortable. Match a modern style perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Singer

customer_reviews.title: So HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these chairs. Great value. Also GREAT seller! they reached out to me after to make sure everything is okay with the product. I APPRECIATE THIS SELLER! Great Product- came faster than initially reported. Buy these ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: One of them came broken, instead of returning only ...
customer_reviews.text: One of them came broken , instead of returning only that one, I had to return all 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Aballi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: amazing chairs, there is a QC issue with the manufacturer though, since I was given two chairs with mismatching legs...
customer_reviews.author: Colin Darden

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking chairs, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, trendy little chairs! Also very sturdy, the pleather and stitching is not super rich looking, but they are nice and for the price they go great with this mid century table from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality chairs that I see myself owning & maintaining for a long time. This product is easy to assemble. It took me about 30 - 45 mins from unwrapping to placement to assemble the chairs. It’s assembly also makes it easy to storage and transport if needed. These chairs are durable & can support at least 200 lbs. The cushion/upholstery on these chairs are comfortable. It does not feel thin or cheaply made. All in all these chairs are the ideal set. They’re stylish without being bulky and taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen A

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Super Nice
customer_reviews.text: Super nice. Faux leather and has a slight cushion on the butt so it's comfortable to sit in for hours. Modern touch for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Threading frays quickly
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice but we use ours as a decor setting so they rarely get used and the threading is already starting to fray could only imagine if they were utilized more often how ruined they would be pretty Dissapointed and Amazon doesn't give the option to contact the seller to inform them
customer_reviews.author: Riah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality + great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs! Super nicely made and very comfortable. Only took about 10 minutes to assemble. I definitely recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs add warmth and function to our office. They are very comfortable and pair nicely with the light gray dining table we use as a conference table.
customer_reviews.author: R. Govan

customer_reviews.title: Function and aesthetic in one great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional with the right aesthetics! And because it’s not real leather I don’t have to worry about my kids greasy fingers! In order to make sure that it screws in evenly, I found that it’s best for one person to sit in the chair while another person tightens the screws. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sepideh Valizadeh

customer_reviews.title: We love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs. The very pleasant surprise is that the legs are all one, connected piece that attach to the bottom of the seat, which create more leg strength. So much better than individual legs that screw or bolt on. The only reason that I'm not giving this a 5 star rating is because perfection in this chair would be a bit wider and maybe a bit higher in the back for hippier and/or taller people. These chairs won't disappoint though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our new conference room chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Well.. putting together 60 of these chairs took some time. But well worth it. I used these for my office conference room, events and they have all held up well. They are comfortable and sturdy. These chairs do not stack.
customer_reviews.author: A and N Mortgage

customer_reviews.title: Good for temporary, but not a permanent fix
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs to serve as a “temporary” fix since we couldn’t decide on a permanent choice. Exactly a year and a few days later, and they were still being used daily when the leg broke off at the welds. The “leather” had also started to peel away from the back of the seat a few months ago. They were fine for a temporary or rarely used seat, but know that they are NOT a permanent fix.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! They look great with our dining room table! Ordered 8!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Best Amazon purchase ever great chairs easy to assemble. Go ahead get them!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase. I wanted something nice modern and not too expensive for my dining room. They are very comfortable perfect height for my table . I paint them for a better match. The only thing my husband took time with assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Margoth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chairs! Buy now
customer_reviews.text: Obsesssssed you have to get these! Only 179 for 4 chairs?!?! So crazy! I wasn’t expecting them to be as sturdy and comfortable as they are! Literally obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey M

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They’re comfortable, easy to clean and lightweight. Painted the legs gold to match the table and it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but 2 of them wobbles..
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied for its price but 2 of them wobbles..i separate them because I thought it wasnt asemble correctly.. but wjen separated the leg part wobbles..so it is kind of defected I like the design
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Min

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are comfortable and look great. Putting them together is easy. All you do is screw in the legs and you are done. The faux leather option looks nice and should be easy to clean. This set is a great dup for some chairs that I saw on allmodern.com and it's about $80 cheaper. It's very hard to find chairs for this price and the quality. I would recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: KJCamm

customer_reviews.title: Great product with affordability
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were straightforward and easy to assemble. Quality was on point for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Herkim

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are such great chairs. They arrived in a box that wasn't too big. Upon opening the box, the chairs had a lot of padding to keep them safe during delivery, and they were really easy to make. They are so comfortable and the size is perfect for anyone. We are very happy with these chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Riboldi

customer_reviews.title: Not leathery at all but blue ones great!
customer_reviews.text: We returned the ones with the brown "leather" texture and ordered a blue set instead. The height and width were perfect, but the brown plastic was lighter in color than the pictures and had an awful feel to the touch. Blue ones however are great and has a nice fabric with good support.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mia Dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Received and put together pretty easily. Love the appearance of the seat
customer_reviews.text: Received and put together pretty easily. Love the appearance of the seat, but the legs have a faux wood look. I expected them to be a solid color, as they appear more solid in the photos. Two of the chairs are absolutely perfect, the other two are very wobbly. I took the legs off and reattached twice to make sure I was assembling them correctly. I assembled correctly, the problem is in the legs, so that is very frustrating. They look bent, perhaps during shipping. Ultimately not returning because it's such a hassle and I enjoy the seat, but I do wish I could get replacement legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather pulls away from chair frame and has air pockets
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful chairs but the leather material is pulling away from the chair itself after a year. Although, these are only brought out when we need them for guests. They are not our main every day chairs so that's pretty disappointing..
customer_reviews.author: richard nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great style, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great style, great quality - Comfortable, stylish, all you can ask for at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hagemann

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these chairs. I bought 8 of them, each order came with 4 chairs in a box. Came well packaged and every chair was perfect. They are great quality for the price and super comfortable. The material on the cognac is beautiful and easy to take care of and wipe clean. The legs do look like wood but are metal. I can't say enough about how amazing these are for the price. Perfect mid century look I was going for but for a fraction of the cost of similar looking chairs.
customer_reviews.author: JYUx2

customer_reviews.title: YESSS
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of these! Measurements were accurate, and surprisingly comfortable. Bonus, they’re packed so well and compactly, I was shocked 4 chairs came in one box smaller than me!
customer_reviews.author: Claudette Boulware

customer_reviews.title: Great value, comfy, cheap materials (to be expected)
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are comfy! Easy to install, the material/quality though was less than what I had hopped for. Given the price I shouldn’t be surprised. Still think its a great value! Solid 4 star purchase given the great price and overall value.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Modern and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are money in the bank! They are stylish and look great! The leather quality is awesome. They also have held up very well to kids!
customer_reviews.author: Wesson_GT

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Washable pleather. Good price. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Great for children and adults. Look good. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. Sturdy. Right price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets (8 chairs) and a few had holes that didn't line up. Also the black pieces on bottom of legs to protect the floor came off the first week of use. Wish I could get replacement pieces, but other than that the chairs are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Begley

customer_reviews.title: Fabric looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning these. I always hope that faux leather will look good and it usually just looks cheap.. they did seem comfy though
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pretty inexpensive option of seating that didn’t look cheap. This worked out perfectly. I examined each chair as soon as I got them because I read reviews of some being defective or damaged. They were in great shape. I did hand paint the legs gold to make them coordinate and also look more expensive. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice style but one of them is defective
customer_reviews.text: The style is nice however one of them is defective and looks like it was used for a long time. One of the chairs wobbles and the caps at the bottom of the legs are peeling and looked like the chair was dragged around. One of the seats came with some glue residue and was rusty. I
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer-Lee Nieves

customer_reviews.title: I love the chairs
customer_reviews.text: They came in the day it told me they would be in. They are very comfortable-I love the color- they are very sturdy - they were very easy to put together. They had all 4 chairs in the same box. Each chair had a plastic bag with it the screws and washers to put together along with an alien wrench for each chair. I love the chairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO NICE... and so comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable mid century modern chairs. We absolutely love them in our dining room and would recommend them to anyone. We paid for 2 sets (4 chairs) but the seller sent us 8 chairs! What a steal. Would buy again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! Packaged well so no damage , they were extremely easy to put together and will last a long time !
customer_reviews.author: Dasia Mack

customer_reviews.title: Not a realistic leather look
customer_reviews.text: Chair material looks cheap. Color is blah brown. I returned item
customer_reviews.author: pinta

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs. Really easy to assemble. I did have to buy little caps for the feet of the chair legs to protect the floor but not a problem. I recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wells

customer_reviews.title: We love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Look great and easy to wipe down. Only can is you can see the black underside if you're sitting on the couch nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great! They look very high end and are extremely comfortable to sit in. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epic Purchase! :)
customer_reviews.text: wow! I cannot believe the quality, these chairs are so nice for the price! they look much more expensive than they are. they are well built, and super comfortable.HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: erik clausen

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Look way more expensive than what they were! All I get are compliments about how stylish and comfortable they are. Great color and quality. I Loved them so much I ordered another set of 4!
customer_reviews.author: Keedy.kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: No instructions included in my order. Once I figured it out assembly went pretty fast. I can’t speak to their comfort as I use them for home staging purposes for my business. They seem decent for short sitting periods. Look like real leather. Sturdy legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay G.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs turned out even better than expected. Yes the leather feels a little cheaper but what do you expect for such a good price. They look true to the color online, are super easy to assemble and were delivered within 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Myrthe

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered in time but the lining of one ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered in time but the lining of one chair was bubbling (separating from the chair) straight out of the box and before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Elegant chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money and it looks so elegant. Love the color n style.
customer_reviews.author: Navitha Mathen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality faux leather. The legs are metal but look like wood. Easy to assemble. Looks much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: hammad malik

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great! I had them assembled in 1 hour. They are perfect at my kitchen table!
customer_reviews.author: FrancesB

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: wow! Much better quality than expected. The fabric is very resilient and the legs are sturdy. I bought this for a home that is rented out on Airbnb. It looks great and so far not a scratch! it's a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kopik

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Look great, feel great, and easy to clean. Super simple to assemble and the metal legs look like fantastic wood legs.
customer_reviews.author: amanda leigh pappas

customer_reviews.title: The base does not align to the seat
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably frustrating assembly. 3 out of 4 holes of the seat align with base making it almost impossible to put together. Absolutely garbage, should be an easy 20 min assembly, i have spent over 2 hours trying to get things to align. DONT ORDER
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Klausing

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light weight, sturdy chairs. I have kids and they are holding up great. Easy to clean as well. Came with the needed supplies to easily put them together. Everyone compliments these chairs and can't believe I purchased them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: GreenForest Dining Chairs Set of 4, Washable Pu Cushion Seat Chair with Metal Legs for Kitchen Dining Room,Brown
feature_bullets: 【Washable Pu dining chairs】- Waterproof Pu cushion seat and back ,ergonomic design is simple and beautiful outlook,anti-dirty material convenient for cleaning, just wipe with a damp cloth.
【Comfortable and sturdy chairs】- Metal tube with wooden transfer legs,seat bottom fixed with sturdy X-shape support,strong bearing strength,backing has a 'little radian',feel more comfortable.
【DIY legs dining chair set of 4】- Paint legs with prefer color by your creativity,the bottom of the chair legs has a plastic pads, a nice soft rubber floor protectors for sensitive flooring.
【Modern dining chairs size 】- 17.7 * 16.9 * 34Inch (D*W*H), lightweight but sturdy ,well made, this dining chair is made to suit all type of rooms,look great even in small apartments.
【Greenforest dining chairs】- Simple assembling, hardware and manual included,easy installation and save your precious time.
